subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Danielle Kang’s 4-foot putt on the next-to-last hole gave her a 2 and 1 victory against Jessica Korda in the United States Women’s Amateur final in Charlotte, N.C.
snippet: Danielle Kang’s 4-foot putt on the next-to-last hole gave her a 2 and 1 victory against Jessica Korda in the United States Women’s Amateur final in Charlotte, N.C.
